Title: Includes Lyme disease and other tick-borne diseases as occupational diseases for purposes of workers' compensation
Summary: Includes Lyme disease and other tick-borne diseases as occupational diseases for purposes of workers' compensation; clarifies that disability includes disability caused by Lyme disease or other tick-borne diseases; requires insurance coverage of long term medical care for Lyme disease and other tick borne diseases.
LawCode: Amd §§3 & 201, Work Comp L; amd §§3216, 3221 & 4303, Ins L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the workers' compensation law, in relation to including Lyme disease and other tick-borne diseases as occupational diseases for purposes of workers' compensation; and to amend the insurance law, in relation to coverage of long term medical care for Lyme disease and other tick-borne diseases
